name: lib/color-contrast-calc.js
ColorContrastCalc
description:
Provides methods to calculate RGB colors.
An instance represents a RGB color.

params.name: rgb
params.description: RGB value represented as a string (hex code) or an array of numbers

params.name: name
params.description: the value of this.name: if null, the value of this.hexCode is set to this.name instead

properties.name: rgb
properties.description: RGB value repsented as an array of decimal numbers

properties.name: relativeLuminance
properties.description: The relative luminance of the color

properties.name: name
properties.description: If no name is explicitely given, the property is set to the value of this.hexCode

properties.name: hexCode
properties.description: The RGB value in hex code notation

name: relativeLuminance
description: Calculate the relative luminance of a RGB color given as a string or an array of numbers

params.name: rgb
params.description: RGB value represented as a string (hex code) or an array of numbers

return.description: Relative luminance

name: contrastRatio
description: Calculate the contrast ratio of given colors

params.name: foreground
params.description: RGB value represented as a string (hex code) or an array of numbers

params.name: background
params.description: RGB value represented as a string (hex code) or an array of numbers

return.description: Contrast ratio

name: getByName
description: Returns an instance of ColorContrastCalc for a predefined color name.

params.name: name
params.description: names are defined at https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/types.html#ColorKeywords

name: getByHexCode
description: Returns an instance of ColorContrastCalc for a hex code

params.name: code
params.description: RGB value in hex code

name: compareFunction
description: Returns a function to be used as a parameter of Array.prototype.sort()

unknown.tagValue: {function} Function that compares given two colors

params.name: colorOrder
params.description: A left side primary color has a higher sorting precedence

params.name: keyType
params.description: Type of keys used for sorting: "color", "hex" or "rgb"

params.name: keyMapper
params.description: A function used to retrive key values from elements to be sorted

return.description: Function that compares given two colors

name: sort
description: Sorts colors in an array and returns the result as a new array

params.name: colors
params.description: List of colors

params.name: colorOrder
params.description: A left side primary color has a higher sorting precedence, and an uppercase letter means descending order

params.name: keyMapper
params.description: A function used to retrive key values from elements to be sorted

params.name: mode
params.description: If set to "hex", key values are handled as hex code strings

return.description: An array of sorted colors

name: newHslColor
description: Creates an instance of ColorContractCalc from an HSL value

params.name: hsl
params.description: an array of numbers that represents an HSL value

return.description: An instance of ColorContrastCalc

name: NAMED_COLORS
description: Array of named colors defined at https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/types.html#ColorKeywords

name: WEB_SAFE_COLORS
description: Array of web safe colors

properties.name: hsl
properties.description: HSL value repsented as an array of decimal numbers

name: contrastRatioAgainst
description: Calculate the contrast ratio against another color

params.name: color
params.description: another instance of ColorContrastCalc or a RGB value

name: colorsWithSufficientContrast
description: Returns an array of named colors that satisfy a given level of contrast ratio

params.name: level
params.description: A, AA or AAA

params.name: ratio
params.description: Value in percent

params.name: name
params.description: Name of color

params.name: ratio
params.description: Value in percent

params.name: name
params.description: Name of color

params.name: ratio
params.description: Value in percent

params.name: name
params.description: Name of color

params.name: degree
params.description: Value in degree

params.name: name
params.description: Name of color

params.name: ratio
params.description: Value in percent

params.name: name
params.description: Name of color

params.name: ratio
params.description: Value in percent

params.name: name
params.description: Name of color

name: findBrightnessThreshold
description:
Tries to find a color whose contrast against the base color is close to a given level.

The returned color is gained by modifying the brightness of otherColor.
Even when a color that satisfies the level is not found, it returns a new color anyway.

unknown.tagValue: {ColorContrastCalc} A color whose contrast against the base color is close to a specified level

params.name: otherColor
params.description: The color before the modification of brightness

params.name: level
params.description: A, AA or AAA

return.description: A color whose contrast against the base color is close to a specified level

name: findLightnessThreshold
description:
Tries to find a color whose contrast against the base color is close to a given level.

The returned color is gained by modifying the lightness of otherColor.
Even when a color that satisfies the level is not found, it returns a new color anyway.

unknown.tagValue: {ColorContrastCalc} A color whose contrast against the base color is close to a specified level

params.name: otherColor
params.description: The color before the modification of lightness

params.name: level
params.description: A, AA or AAA

return.description: A color whose contrast against the base color is close to a specified level

unknown.tagValue: {string} A, AA or AAA if the contrast ratio meets the criteria of WCAG 2.0, otherwise "-"

return.description: A, AA or AAA if the contrast ratio meets the criteria of WCAG 2.0, otherwise "-"

name: hasSufficientContrast
description: Checks if the contrast ratio between the base color and otherColor meets the requirement of WCAG 2.0

params.name: level
params.description: A, AA or AAA

name: isSameColor
description: Checks if the base color and otherColor have the same RGB value

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if each primary color of the base color is 0 or 255

return.description: true if each primary color of the base color is 0 or 255

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if the hex code of the color is #808080

return.description: true if the hex code of the color is #808080

name: toString
description:
Returns a string representation of the color.
When 16 is passed, it return the hex code, and when 10 is passed, it returns the value in RGB notation
Otherwise, it returns the color name or the hex code

params.name: base
params.description: 16, 10 or null

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if the relative luminance of the base color is greater than that of otherColor

return.description: true if the relative luminance of the base color is greater than that of otherColor

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if the relative luminance of the base color is equal to that of otherColor

return.description: true if the relative luminance of the base color is equal to that of otherColor

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if the contrast ratio against white is qual to/ less than the ratio against black

return.description: true if the contrast ratio against white is qual to/ less than the ratio against black

name: lib/color-utils.js
hexCodeToDecimal
description: Converts a hex color code string to a decimal representation

unknown.tagValue: {Array<number, number, number>} RGB value represented as an array of numbers

params.name: hexCode
params.description: Hex color code such as "#ffff00"

return.description: RGB value represented as an array of numbers

name: normalizeHexCode
description: Converts a hex color code to a 6-digit hexadecimal string

params.name: hexString
params.description: String that represent a hex code

params.name: prefix
params.description: Append '#' to the head of return value if a truthy value is given

return.description: 6-digit hexadecimal string with/without leading '#'

name: decimalToHexCode
description: Converts a decimal representation of color to a hex code string

params.name: rgb
params.description: RGB value represented as an array of numbers

return.description: RGB value in hex code

name: hslToRgb
description: Converts HSL value to RGB value

unknown.tagValue: {Array<number, number, number>} An array of numbers that represents RGB value

params.name: hsl
params.description: An array of numbers that represents HSL value

return.description: An array of numbers that represents RGB value

name: hslToHexCode
description: Converts HSL value to hex code

params.name: hsl
params.description: An array of numbers that represents HSL value

return.description: Hex code

name: decimalRound
description: Decimal rounding with a given precision

params.name: number
params.description: Number to be rounded off

params.name: precision
params.description: Number of digits after the decimal point

return.description: returns the rounded number

name: isValidRgb
description: Checks if a given array is a valid representation of RGB color.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if the argument is a valid RGB color

params.name: rgb
params.description: RGB value represented as an array of numbers

return.description: true if the argument is a valid RGB color

name: isValidHsl
description: Checks if a given array is a valid representation of HSL color.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if the argument is a valid HSL color

params.name: hsl
params.description: HSL value represented as an array of numbers

return.description: true if the argument is a valid HSL color

name: isValidHexCode
description: Checks if a given string is a valid representation of RGB color.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} returns true if then argument is a valid RGB color

params.name: code
params.description: RGB value in hex code

return.description: returns true if then argument is a valid RGB color

name: isSameHexColor
description: Checks if given two hex color codes represent a same color.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if given two colors are same

params.name: hexCode1
params.description: Color given as a hex code, such as "#ffff00", "#FFFF00" or "#ff0"

params.name: hexCode2
params.description: Color given as a hex code, such as "#ffff00", "#FFFF00" or "#ff0"

return.description: True if given two colors are same

name: isSameRgbColor
description: Checks if given two RGB values represent a same color.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if given two colors are same

params.name: rgb1
params.description: Color given as an array of numbers, such as [255, 255, 0]

params.name: rgb2
params.description: Color given as an array of numbers, such as [255, 255, 0]

return.description: True if given two colors are same

name: isString
description: Checks if a given object is a string

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} returns true if the argument is a string

params.name: str
params.description: Object to be checked

return.description: returns true if the argument is a string

name: isUpperCase
description: Checks if a given string is consists of uppercase letters

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} returns true if letters in the argument string are all uppercase

params.name: str
params.description: string to be checked

return.description: returns true if letters in the argument string are all uppercase
